title: Update failed
body:
Hey.
I cant login. 
When ai lunch the game, I get the message: unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information. I have the last patch.
What can i do?

Thx

replies.body:
Depending on where the failure is happening, this failure could be caused by a number of different factors. In general, our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) resolves most of these issues, as we've consolidated the most common fixes in it.

Please let me know if this resolved it for you.
